name: Worst World
storyline:
In this game you have the possibility to create bases and customize them, steal cars and motorbikes in order to move around the map more quickly. Collect weapons to face the zombies, Collect food, care as well as tools like a pickaxe, an ax is a knife. For example the knife will be very useful to you to recover zombie skins and not to be spotted by them. In addition the game contains a crafting system allowing you to combine objects and obtain new items, Create your own weapons like a bat with a nail! So dreadful ... Beware of illness and cold that can make you fall ill, it's up to you to learn how to cure them or how to slow down certain death.

But above all there is a danger. The others, indeed hunger will push players to kill you for your resources or for the craziest, to devour you.
summary: Worst World is a Hardcore zombie multiplayer survival game. Survive in a post apocalyptic world, collect resources and set up camps. Make friends or join a micro society of survivors. The World does not give you a gift. No crosshair, menu, life bar. You can be happy to breathe and to have spent the night every day.
